title: Do you have a pet? If so, tell me about your pet. If not, would you like to have one?

korean: 나는 지금 반려동물을 키우고 있지는 않아.
예전에 고양이를 키웠었는데, 정말 좋은 기억들이 많아.
요즘도 반려동물 키우고 싶다는 생각을 자주 해.
특히 강아지를 키우고 싶은데, 여건이 안 돼서 망설이고 있어.
일단 혼자 사는데 출퇴근 시간이 길어서 걱정이야.
강아지를 집에 혼자 두고 가는 게 마음에 걸려.
그리고 아파트에서 키우려면 이웃들한테 피해 주지 않을까 걱정돼.
나중에 여유가 생기면 꼭 입양하고 싶어.
그때까지는 친구네 강아지나 고양이 카페 가서 대신 만족하고 있어.
언젠가는 책임감 있게 잘 키울 수 있을 때 입양할 거야.
english: I don't currently have a pet.
I used to have a cat before, and I have really, like, many good memories.
These days I often think about wanting to have a pet.
I especially want to have a dog, but I'm hesitating because, you know, conditions aren't right.
First of all, I live alone and my commute time is long, so I'm worried.
Leaving the dog alone at home bothers me.
And if I raise it in an apartment, I'm worried it might, like, bother the neighbors.
I also have to think about the financial burden.
Veterinary bills and pet food costs are, you know, not cheap.
Later when I have more time, I definitely want to adopt one.
Until then, I'm satisfying myself by going to my friends' dogs or cat cafés.
Someday when I can raise one responsibly, I'll adopt.
